thread.section_title: Chinese Motorcycle Parts Online Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of chinesemotorcyclepartsonline.co.uk
thread.title: Scott Muxworthy
thread.title_full: Chinese Motorcycle Parts Online reviewed by Scott Muxworthy

author: Scott Muxworthy
title: Scott Muxworthy
text: I have purchased parts for mine and my sons bike over the last month or so and have found the quality of the items purchased to be top quality. I have for purchased short brake and clutch levers for both bikes and some smaller items all of which have been delivered within a day or two and have been exactly what I have ordered. Can honestly say they are value for money and will be using them again.
